title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-02] [$250] Workspace - "Remove member" modal show that the user is an approver when they are not approver
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Create a new workspace
3. Go to workspace settings > Members
4. Add some members
5. Click on any member
6. Click Remove from workspace

Expected result: "Remove member" modal will not show that the user is an approver if they are not an approver

Actual result: None
